mapper.select: SELECT p.productCode, p.productType, p.productName, p.weight, p.size, p.price, p.unit, s.salePrice, s.fromDate, s.endDate FROM Product p LEFT JOIN SalePrice s ON p.productCode = s.productCode WHERE (p.productCode LIKE #{allProductInfo} OR p.productName LIKE #{allProductInfo} OR p.productType LIKE #{allProductInfo}) AND (s.fromDate = #{fromDate} AND s.endDate = #{endDate}) AND s.buyerCode = #{tableBuyerCode} ORDER BY p.productName

SELECT p.productCode, p.productName, p.productType, p.size, p.unit, p.price, s.salePrice, s.priceId FROM Product p LEFT JOIN SalePrice s ON s.productCode = p.productCode LEFT JOIN Buyer b ON s.buyerCode = b.buyerCode where p.productCode = #{productCode} AND b.buyerCode = #{buyerCode} AND s.fromDate = #{fromDate} AND s.endDate = #{endDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Order_header( deliveryDate, buyerCode, status, message, memberId, writer ) VALUES(#{deliveryDate}, #{buyerCode}, #{status} , #{message}, #{memberId}, (SELECT name FROM Member where id = #{memberId}))
mapper.update: UPDATE Order_header SET orderCode = CONCAT('WT',#{year}, #{generatedId}) WHERE orderId = #{generatedId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Order_item( orderId, productCode, quantity, finalPrice, sum ) VALUES(#{generatedId}, #{oid.productCode}, #{oid.quantity}, #{oid.finalPrice}, #{oid.sum})
mapper.select: SELECT inserted FROM Order_header WHERE orderId = #{generatedId}
SELECT productCode, fromDate, endDate FROM SalePrice WHERE buyerCode=#{tableBuyerCode} AND productCode LIKE #{allProductInfo}
SELECT b.buyerName, b.buyerCode, oh.deliveryDate, oh.modified, oh.message FROM Order_header oh LEFT JOIN Buyer b ON b.buyerCode = oh.buyerCode WHERE orderId = #{orderId}

SELECT oi.productCode, p.productType, p.productName, p.unit, p.size, p.price, oi.finalPrice, oi.quantity, oi.sum FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Order_item oi ON p.productCode = oi.productCode WHERE oi.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Order_header SET deliveryDate = #{ohd.deliveryDate}, buyerCode = #{ohd.buyerCode}, status = #{ohd.status}, message = #{ohd.message}, modified = #{ohd.modified} WHERE orderId = #{orderId}
